website_summaries.verdict: One of the best American Tourister hardshell bags you can buy, this case keeps belongings amply protected.
pros: Many buyers love the 21-inch bag's fun color options
Spinner wheels allow for maximum control
Handle locks when extended to prevent breakage and unnecessary sliding
cons: Some buyers had issues with the bag arriving damaged upon initial shipping

customer_reviews.title: I love this carry on
customer_reviews.text: I love this carry on. It is lightweight and fits a lot! I was able to pack 5 days worth of clothes, 3 pairs of shoes, plus my everyday travel items, a travel blanket, and a box of granola bars even! Very easy to handle also.
customer_reviews.author: Jami L. Kaltenbronn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rose gold carry on! Holds a lot and the zipper compartment in the front half is really handy. With a backpack to hold my purse/laptop, I was easily able to pack for 7 days away (and still had some room to spare). Rolls very quietly/smoothly in the airport. I’ve traveled four times with this as a carry on with Southwest and haven’t had any issues fitting it in the overhead.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suitcase! I was between colors but decided on the black/white because I was afraid the other color may get dirty. I’m so glad I did because after traveling for 2 weeks, the suitcase had minor black marks from the airlines but they blend in with the pattern. I feel as though there is even more space in this suitcase than my other 24 inch. The mesh side made it easier for organization during my travels as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and warranty is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Only had this six months and the handle gets stuck. It's also scratches easily. My biggest complaint is the 10 year warranty. It's nearly impossible to navigate the repair and warranty approval submittal process. Plus you are responsible to pay to ship your suitcase to have it evaluated for repair coverage. Basically, pay$30 to see if your $60 suitcase *might* be covered by warranty. I gave up and came here to write a negative review instead because it was just too complicated to figure it out (they require SKU# just to start). Forget it unless you're good with only six months of use.
customer_reviews.author: MS ANN P WENZELL

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling companion!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size carry-on. Wheels are smooth, zipper is substantially secure and the piece is not to heavy, I had it in another color and dragged it all over the world for 3 years with no issues. That one had zippered pockets in the mesh divider which was nice and this one doesn’t have
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Antestenis

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this suitcase and will buy another in the size ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this suitcase and will buy another in the size down from this one. I took this suitcase to Europe for 10 days and it took a beating from airline rough handling to walking old streets and even a dirt and pebble road. It fit everything without using the expander before I left. Coming home, I was able to fit all of my souvenirs, etc using the expander. I can't praise this suitcase enough and the pink color was easy to find in baggage claim. I can't believe how great this suitcase is for the price! Wheels are study, suitcase body is sturdy, yet lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Susane R.

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best suitcase I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best suitcase I've ever owned. The color is beautiful, it's very easy to roll at 360d, and the multiple handle size adjustments are very convenient. I was able to fit about 10 days worth of travel items. I'm confident that my items are safe in the hardback style - hardly anything shifted during travel, also thanks to the zipped compartment and strap for clothing. Perfect size for a carry-on, I have flown multiple airlines with this suitcase and no one has requested to check the size or weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it both the color and using it !
customer_reviews.text: The airlines tried to damage it . It did not scratch or dent only had mark where it had obviously been thrown or dropped off cart . Lots of room and within the measurement standards for the airlines. The wheels work great .
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Passero

customer_reviews.title: Used once - lightly - as carry on but already unsewn
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for the first time and it is already becoming unsewn in the zipper. I am going to contact the company and amazon for a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: jjfm3

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box, a terrible chemical smell wafted out. The suitcase has a cancer-causing chemical warning on the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Darden

customer_reviews.title: Scratches very easily, but is tough as nails!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage has survived 6 airports and 3 countries! I have thrown this luggage, sat on it, and overstuffed it, but it took everything swimmingly. The only suggestion I have is, if you want to maintain the look of this piece, then definitely invest in luggage covering. Other than that, this luggage was worth every dime! I look forward to buying the other pieces, to complete the set!
customer_reviews.author: diamond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, very fast shipping, excellent quality, I totally recommend the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous chemicals in this product.
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase had such a strong chemical smell that I could not keep it in the house. After three days out in the fresh air, the smell was still strong. This is unacceptable and I am returning it. Otherwise not a bad suitcase and the color was nice. Please whoever is making this stuff (China) stop using this awful material. I am sure it is dangerous to your health.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Bradford

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This carry on is so cute! It’s the perfect size for quick trips and is light weight. It fits comfortably in over head compartments of airplanes as well as rolls well in the airport. I would definitely recommend it if you’re looking for a hard shell carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move about
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect on flight carrier! I can fit a weeks worth of outfits in here. All comes down to packing styles. It rolls easily in any direction. Pretty tough. I'm very happy with the purchase. I plan on getting another for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this piece. I had a super long walk from the parking lot to the terminal and the roads were under repair so it was a bumpy walk. I had no trouble wheeling my luggage! No struggles! No frustration! i expected it to get dirty when sending it through baggage so the marks on it don’t bother me. I can still love the rose gold color. Even if I didn’t win in Las Vegas where the bag made it’s first trip, I feel like a winner with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: ... on an 800+ mile road trip and it's rolling like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I have stowed this bag in 4 planes and taken it on an 800+ mile road trip and it's rolling like a champ! I fell in love with the design, which obviously didn't remain prestine as it was loaded and handled through baggage claim, but is still vibrant and fun, even with a few signs of use. It holds an impressive amount of stuff and I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Parks

customer_reviews.title: Arrived completely Broken
customer_reviews.text: The bag was completely trashed. The handles are completely broken on one side and this means that I can't use it to roll it nor can I use the other handle to carry it. This bag should have been free.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: Guys.... this is an awesome little suitcase! (I say little but it seriously fits so much!) I was worried about the size because let’s face it.... I’m a girl and always overpack way too many clothes! But this was perfect! It went to Arizona and California with me for a week and even after purchasing souvenirs still fit all my stuff since it expands with a zipper to make it taller! Love this suitcase so much! Fit perfectly in the overhead as a carry-on! Would definitely recommend! I love the print as well and it looks brand new even after a few flights! Super lightweight and the wheels make it very easy to move around! Love this suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: KyKy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: This would work find for anyone that just needs a case to throw some stuff in.. there aren’t any compartments or pockets. The bigger question is why would any manufacturer of luggage make a case that is significantly smaller than the standard carry-on size? It’s a theme - not only with this case. I ended up finding a case that was more than double the price, but it was also as big as you could fit in a carry on bin and it has locks and compartments. Bottom line is that a more expensive case is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Darling and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little suitcase—it is adorable! Even the lining has the print of the popsicles (although in gray). It holds a good amount of stuff. I’m going away for 4 days and it is plenty big enough to hold outfits—and a few pairs of shoes and the stuff you take with you. I thought I would need to buy a bigger suitcase, but it holds more than you think. The only sad thing is checking it because you get black rubs and scratches on it. If you can carry on, do it. Hate to see all the dirt and scratches on this cutie! The zippers are great and it even expands! Well-made. Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: speedybee62

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I traveled with it last week to Europe- durable and pretty looking.Got through 4 flights. It got a little scratched up cause it is white- but nothing too noticeable. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Lentiful

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large suitcase fast as one I had been using was damaged during travel. The reviews on this suitcase helped with my decision. It arrived precisely on schedule and was exactly what I was expecting. Surprisingly lightweight before packing and maneuvers well packed to just under 50lb. It has already taken 3 segments of travel (including 1 international) and looks as brand new as when it came out of the box. I'm very pleased with this purchase and may order matching, smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Shari-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Short half life
customer_reviews.text: I've used this suit case on 2 1 week vacations... and the zipper to close the suitcase broke. I was overseas trying to catch my next flight. That's horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Fits fine in overhead bins (I traveled on both Delta and American on my trip and had no issues). I was able to fit a week's worth of clothes, and in fact a few extra options, and a pair of wedges, toiletries, full size hair straightener and curler, and probably could've shoved more in if needed. The wheels seem to work fine (only flown twice, so I can't speak to the longevity) and the handle is ok (seems a tad wobbly, but that seems to be the norm). People thought I paid twice the price. Highly recommend if you're looking for a rolling carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Carry-On
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend when she needed to replace her old one, which had gotten beat up and the wheels were really bad. This bag is very light weight, sturdy, well built, rolls super smoothly and has a nice classy look to it. She loves it! This bag was a bit more expensive than some of the other options, but I'd definitely say it's worth the extra bucks for the quality you get. As frequent business/leisure travelers for many years we've certainly been through our share of luggage. I rank this one right at the top and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag based on the reviews and the fact it was a carry on that expanded. I have used it once and it worked out great. I live in Chicago so getting to the airport I had to get the bag on the train and bus. The wheels worked great and maneuver well. I was able to pack 4 pair of shoes in addition to clothes for a long weekend and 2 toiletry bags. But I did use packing bags for my clothes. It fit well into the overhead compartment.
customer_reviews.author: CPayne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: We tried to go cheap with another brand that didn't work out. The other brand didn't survive one trip. However, the American Tourister has now made 4 trips (3 domestic and 1 international) without issues or concerns. The palm tree print also makes it very easy to recognize on a crowded luggage carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: Luggage Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this travel luggage! Easy to maneuver on diff kinds of surfaces, expands by zipper when extra room is need or touches when you need it to fit in a smaller space. Great for carry on and over head binds on all planes! Very durable, spacious inside and super fashionable, I always get compliments when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonee&Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wheels did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this set. I purchased for a international trip. These were my first suticases on wheels. The wheels did not hold up and by the time I got home I was dragging the heavy bags on wheels that were distorted. These were supposed to be a life time warrantee. I was going to return them but was looing for a box and now Amazon says I cannot return them. A real waste of money. I cannot use the suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Low durability and defective
customer_reviews.text: I received this suitcase with 2 defective inside zippers. I ordered a replacement and when that arrived, it too had 2 defective zippers. The zippers had no pull on them and they could be pulled apart easily. The inside liner is very cheap and not durable at all. The only thing I liked about this item was that it is lightweight. I've sent both back and am waiting to receive credit.
customer_reviews.author: Tara m.

customer_reviews.title: Good, not amazing. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to fly from Alabama to Washington, round trip. Does pretty well walking through airports. The handle can get locked up pulling it up and down, but a good yank will make it fully extend. It does get scratched up very easily! I feel it is still worth purchasing though. The white made it easy to spot at baggage claim and that was the main reason I bought this one. I like the hard shell much more than a fabric shell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Denny

customer_reviews.title: wheel broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this spinner when it arrived, despite the fact that there was dried glue on the latch of the stretch band inside. I ordered the marble one, it was beautiful. But two months later, one of the wheels has disintegrated, so it doesn't spin anymore. It can't even stand up straight. And worst of all, American Tourister has not gotten back to me in 24 business hours (a ridiculous phrase, how about 3 business days?)! So I bought a TravelPro Rollaboard, almost twice the money but I'm very happy with it. I'm guessing that if you pull the spinner on smooth floors only, and never on a street surface, the wheels would survive. But streets exist.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice..  Easy to Handle and Pack..  Expandable and Seem Durable..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and just got back from a cruise and got many compliments. That was not the reason we ordered them. We wanted spinners, hard side and (if available) expandable. It was a plus to find American Tourister.. We are still out on the durability question, but given the company's reputation and our experience, we feel comfortable. Absolutely no problems on vacation. Easy to pack and my wife can handle them easily..
customer_reviews.author: KSHII

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE & LIGHTWEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute & lightweight. I wanted a pattern that’s easy to identify if I decide to check my bag while still looking cute :) it doesn’t have a chemical smell inside, but it does have a “new” smell - which personally I don’t consider a bad thing. I will say although it’s cute I can tell this won’t last too long until it has scuff marks after being check unless I get a suitcase cover but honestly I don’t care that much yet. You get what you pay for & $45 isn’t bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great suitcase. It doesn't maneuver like the expensive ones but still stands and rolls nicely even weighed at 60lbs. The zipper feels ok and you can definitely pack an absolute ton of stuff. Held up well so far through flights (I travel weekly). I don't buy expensive luggage and feel this is a great deal for the money. Definitely would buy again. Only downside is no small compartments but I bought the Samsonite compression ziplock type bags which I love.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyAddiction

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ladies carry on!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice carry on! Spins very easily and it's really lightweight. I like that one side has a strap closure to keep things in place and the other side has a zipped closure. I also really like that this extends in case I need it a little bigger. It'll probably get scratched up with the traveling but for the price, as long as it doesn't crack or break open, I'm satisfied! Very attractive ladies carry on and I'd recommend. Hope this review was helpful to you!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: both handles broke off on my second use!
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to Paris with this suitcase. It seemed to be great, very maneuverable and light weight... as I was packing for my return back home, the top handle snapped off in my hand. I didn't think TOO much of it, as it still had another handle on the side, where I put my luggage tag and my name tag. The second handle broke off somewhere between check in and baggage claim. I found it without any tags, and it's handle was somewhere else on the belt all by itself. Such a shame. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Sontag

customer_reviews.title: Great structure and color
customer_reviews.text: I love this suitcase. It is the correct size. It fit in the overhead bin of my JetBlue flight to bermuda. It fit all my clothes for one week. It might not fit boots but it fit some flat shoes. The color,shape, size, and structure is great. The interior has a black and gold plaid lining. It is sturdy. Minor scuffs occurred when I checked it, but nothing was broken inside (pottery). It also has a good set of wheels and handle. A carry on shuffle fits on top.100% would recommend as a good carry on at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Danaaa

customer_reviews.title: First class to Airbnb and Uber
customer_reviews.text: I went on a trip to Los Angeles arriving by railroad and left on a First Class flight. This case went in my train cabin as carry on luggage in first class railway and to my AirBnb. This model was great because it is light enough to get key items on the go. When I left the Airbnb using my Uber it went in the cars trunk which was a compact Prius. At the LAX airport I breezed through check in and this case allowed me to use the wheels to drag this around while I visited the bars and restaurants at LAX. In first class going home I put this case in my overhead compartment with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Topaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t explain how over joyed I am at this purchase. The package was packed double so the suitcase was Perfect! I opened it up and the inside is very very roomy. I can get 5-6 outfits and separate compartment for beauty and socks. So glad I made this choice. If you decide to purchase, you’ll be happy. I fly out in 8 days but this is a carry on so they don’t get the chance to throw it around at the airport. So so happy. Beautiful finish on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as a carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit as a carry on. Had to check bag.
customer_reviews.author: NICKA426

customer_reviews.title: Easily Scratched!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the suitcase when I received it However on my first trip on October 3, 2018, I had to check the bag. It made the fist trip unscathed However on my reuturn trip on October 8th, my bag came off the Baggage Retrieval with a small scratch near the top and a huge deep gash on the leather side of the bag front I was just devasted I feel the bag should be able to survive being checked without being destroyed I don't know how I am going to repair this gash Terribly disappointed Barbara Grogan
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA GROGAN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality. Great as a carry-on luggage.
customer_reviews.text: WOW. The interior is absolutely gorgeous and the rose gold color really shines. I always wanted a 4 wheel roller carryon but with style. Most carryon's that looked cute were always over $150-200. This was super affordable and is honestly great quality in person. I have no complaints! I've already taken this on a couple flights and it defintely fits in the overhead compartment (at least with American Airlines) but I believe all (if not, most) have the same dimension requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile ago but just now flew with it and I LOVE it!!!! Had no issues fitting in the overhead compartment on the plane; and the 4 roller wheels are amazing. So easy to move through the airport. I love the straps and zipper compartment on the inside. The outsize zippers are a breeze to use. I have not check this bag so I don’t know how it will hold up being thrown around but for carry on traveling this is a fantastic suitcase. Holds a lot too! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HopeB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this suitcase, but more importantly it holds a lot!! We like to go away on the weekends, and because I don’t always know in advance what we’ll be doing, I tend to bring a variety of clothes. This suitcase also helps to keep me organized by putting my rolled clothes on one side, and my cosmetics and shoes on the other. This is great for carry on or any other use. It is sturdy and rolls easily. I love it, and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JoniB3505

customer_reviews.title: Ease of movement !!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the old two wheel unit, until recently a wheel broke !!! So I got this one. Just returned from London and it was great, so easy to move around. I even bought some new clothes and by opening the second zipper I was able to pack three new shirts and two new pairs of jeans !!!
customer_reviews.author: Spang

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, fun, and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I love this fun little bag. But it's value doesn't end with the looks. It is both sturdy, lightweight and easy to maneuver. The dome , or egg-like, shape appears to allow a little more room inside that some other carry ons. In any case, Iighly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Music1638

customer_reviews.title: Color is NOT white
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed about this product was the color. The white marble design I thought I had purchased ended up being a light blue color instead. There were also several scuff marks on the front of the outer shell. Will be returning and will not be repurchasing. Photo shows suitcase color compared to a plain white notecard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: So I was in need of a good, durable carry-on bag & I searched a lot until I found this one. Not only to I adore the marble print but it’s suprisojgly sturdy for how light-weight it is. I love that it has a mesh food on one side that you can zip up so you’re things don’t go rattling all over the place. I use this luggage for all my trips of a week or less & it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and function
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used two of these suitcases (hers was the Rose-colored model) on a recent trip, flying Southwest Airlines. The case fit nicely in the overhead bin and they were easy to navigate in the aisle.
customer_reviews.author: azdiyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been happier with a suitcase! It is lightweight, has a 360 spin radius, and is a beautiful color. I never have a problem finding my suitcase when traveling. After 6 airline trips and checking the bag, it has very minimal scratching or damage! No untreading of any zippers. It expands easily and holds enough clothes for 2 adults for 6 days! I took it to Scotland for 12 days, 1w outfits and was the only bag I used.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I shared this piece of luggage for a four day trip and it held everything we needed. It was also lightweight and easy to lift up into the overhead bin on the airplane. It appears we got a special price on this one (around $60) because it was not a popular color or design, but neither made a difference to me. I'm very pleased with the quality of it and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for weekend/week getaway
customer_reviews.text: Got it in two days, right before a trip. Plenty of room for packing but also helps me pack just what I need.. because I like the convenience of being able to carry it on the plane with me if I want. it just barely makes the size requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Caravello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Light weight. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as a carry on for a flight and I am so glad that I did this is a gorgeous bag! It has an awesome inside with a zipper section that's separate from the main compartment. I love how lightweight it is but my absolute favorite feature is the design. It stands out in such a beautiful way! I'm so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Luna Fam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I traveled with this item twice and the zipper broke!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Linda Ford

customer_reviews.title: Stinky smell & zipper broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived it had a horrible smell. Six months later, still cannot get the smell out. I traveled with it five times, but the main zipper is now broken so the luggage is now unusable. Because of the weird smell and only lasted 6 months, would not recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lundin

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but lacks spine.
customer_reviews.text: I was sold on this particular item because I am a sucker for a holographic top coat, but this suitcase does not have an aggressive enough shell as I was hoping for, though I think it'll do for small excursions by car. As far as flying with, the way I've seen airport luggage handlers toss suitcases from off of those narrow airplane escalators, this feels as if it could crack easily upon a medium impact. I wish it had a thicker exterior. Alas, it scratched super easily and now I couldn't return it if I wanted, so I will use it nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mills

customer_reviews.title: Very strong odor - air out before use
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase itself is great - sturdy, beautiful, and serves its purpose well. Just make sure you don’t plan on using it right away. It had such a strong odor that I wish I had ordered it at least a week before we used it in order to have had enough time to air it out and get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: aher15

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, maneuverable bag perfect for carry on!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag made traveling alone with my two child so much easier. I love the maneuverability the wheels provide. The bag was very spacious and the perfect carry on size. Love the unique color selections. That was a bonus! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Shilling

customer_reviews.title: Outer shell not very dourable.
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase was roomy, light weight and rolled easily. The reason for the lower than perfect rating was due to the outer "skin". After my one use, the outer shell had places where the color was literally scuffed and peeling off. I had a Samsonite hard shell that has been all over and that never happened. Had to get a new one due to blown out wheel. Thought I would try this brand. It proved to not be as dourable.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really love this--the look is good and the storage approach lets you be very organized. the wheels are smooth. One plane ride and the case cracked. It is still useable and i am not sure it is the fault of the suitcase vs baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed. Four stars only if you wanted to stack it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wheels. Roomy and the expandable space is a bonus. I use it for carry one only. When expanded too large by most airlines carry one standards though so keep that in mind if you want to use it fully expanded. Getting it through the airport was a breeze. For my needs it works great. Giving it four stars ONLY because i wouldn't pile too much weight on it if you need to stack it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Cute rose gold suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute looking yet robust suitcase. It looks like it will bot get scratched easily, and I really hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna V.

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am super excited to use it. I only do carry-on when I travel now so I’m not too worried about scratching or denting like people who check their bags are. It’s just a lovely pink in the outside and it looks pretty spacious. I’ll repost after having used it.
customer_reviews.author: Marita4blue

customer_reviews.title: We went on a flight and it was so packed ...
customer_reviews.text: We went on a flight and it was so packed they made me check the bag. When I got it back some of the color had peeled off. Sometimes it rolls smoothly other times the wheels get stuck usually in a turn. But still it served its purpose in my last two trips and it fits a lot of stuff. I out enough clothes in there for me and my two kids for 4 days
customer_reviews.author: Wendys Osoria

customer_reviews.title: holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium sized luggage! I see some reviews saying that it gets scratched up but I didn't experience that. it hold up really well! i would say the medium sized suitcase gets up to 40 lbs when filled to the max with all your stuff. the design is really cute and it looks expensive and nice! i highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tina Duong

customer_reviews.title: this suitcase is probably fine..
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get - the wheels on this started unhinging and getting stuck on my 5th or 6th use. If you don't travel or use luggage frequently, this suitcase is probably fine... but if you're a frequent traveler and need to get around places quickly, I would not recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, lightweight and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This item is so easy to handle, very lightweight and is such a pretty and unique color which makes it easier to identify when coming off the luggage trolley. We've had it for a couple years now and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. I’ve read some reviews of some loose threads, tears by the zipper and interiors. I don’t see any on mines. But if u do I would recommend to cut any loose threads before use. Before it gets caught in the zipper and then starts to tear down the line. Pretty good quality for the price. I definitely would buy another from this brand. I leave in two months for my trip. I will update review when I get back from my trip. I was trying to submit a picture but for some reason it wasn’t uploading.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa, HI

customer_reviews.title: It works for those on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it looks cheap quality in real life but it works if you’re on a budget. However I got stopped by American Airlines and asked to check my baggage Bc it didn’t fit in overhead bin once. Depends on the airplane model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this suitcase for my trip to Italy. It was the perfect size and it held up through the airport checked luggage system. I will probably get the larger size also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to handle luggage
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprise by this luggage. It met all our requirements on a recent week long trip. We are older folks and the bags were easy to handle and very maneuverable. The shell does show scratches and other blemishes fairly easily which is cosmetic but does affect the look. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taffy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First Tourister I've owned. Lightweight, strong, easy maneuverability. Feels and looks sturdy; inside zippers good quality. Time will tell about the handle quality; so far no problems but I've only used it on three flights. Bought for about $50 so a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: exercising for life

customer_reviews.title: Only made it through one vacation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this luggage expecting it to get a few dings from travel, but I wasn't expecting the zipper to give out during it's first use! Then to pay for shipping to get it repaired under the warranty??? Might as well buy a new bag. Looks great, but not durable AT ALL. I guess that was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Mc

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I could not beat the price on this it was so affordable. The suitcases are very durable strong material and I have no problem putting up and down the handle. The wheels traveled easily and the different sizes is perfect for me and my husband I would highly recommend this brand
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...the rose gold is perfect! I purchased the 21" & the 28" & very pleased with both.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McGill

customer_reviews.title: SO DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I have packed and unpacked this bag so many times. Loaded it up with clothes, shoes etc and some how this thing just keeps looking good! I am in love with the quality!!!! I am in a long distance relationship and my fiance lives in the UK, so we travel a lot to see one another as well as take holidays together. This bad boy right here hasn't let me down and I like the american tourister brand for their luggage a lot !
customer_reviews.author: Juhi Patel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but lousy quality
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just used this for the first time last week. First time, and the stitching is coming out around the zipper that closes the suitcase! I thought with the American Tourister name it would be quality. Looks great, but falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: L. Biringer

customer_reviews.title: First use!!  FAILED!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for our great-granddaughter failed on first use! She went on a Church trip 27 December. The suitcase was fine when she gave it to transportation. See the photo of what she received on arrival! Obvious construction flaw! No response from Tourister customer service - PATHETIC!! DO NOT BUY TOURISTER PRODUCTS IF YOU WANT A GOOD PRODUCT BACKED BY RESPONSIVE CUSTOMER SERVICE!! CAVEAT EMPTOR!!!
customer_reviews.author: John F. McMerty

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and worked well as a carry-on. My only complaint is that one of the wheels would randomly stop working in the normal rolling position (behind me) so I would have to roll it on all four wheels in front of me most of the time which was okay but not ideal when you're in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: James E Trimble Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This fit nicely into the overhead bin and was easy to pack and carry. The wheels are great and make it easy to turn and roll the suitcase. It survived at trip to Houston and had no scratches after being checked. It was a great suitcase to pack just as a carryon for a five-day trip.
customer_reviews.author: BrinleyH98

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish luggage that seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suitcase. I love the design of it and it holds the perfect amount of clothes for a 3-4 day trip. The wheels roll well and the handle is sturdy. I've has spinner luggage in the past that seem to get off balance and become hard to roll while upright if they were packed in a certain way, but I can pack this one any way I please and it still rolls smoothly. It seems durable, but I have only taken it on a few flights and can't attest to its longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: girlintheyellowdress

customer_reviews.title: Best suitcase I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: I want to buy one of these for each one of my family members. It’s so durable and lightweight. I finally bought some packing cubes to go with it and wow. My traveling will never be the same! I’m a “bring the whole house” packer and was able to fit so much in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off !!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the extension handle broke off between my first and a second hotel here in Portugal Don’t know what I will do to maneuver it for the next 10 days... Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslyn@PSU

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute
customer_reviews.text: This is soooooo freaking cute! Like the cutest! It seems sturdy and has plenty of room for a long weekends worth of clothes or a week of summer/light weighted clothes. I have used it in real world yet. But will be in 46 days. Will update if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle
customer_reviews.text: We used ONCE! Wife and I just got back from the hospital from having our first baby and we used this suitcase to pack things for the hospital stay. Top handle was broken! Screw stripped out and won’t screw back in. The threading is compromised on the handle. Very disappointed. Spent $88 on this suitcase and I am outside return window at this point. I sure hope they read this review. I will update if they reach out to me to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this!! Very durable. No scratches or any signs of abuse by the airlines. Easy to identify on the luggage belt and attractive. Staff at the airline contented on how"cute" it was. Definitely using this brand for more luggage if I ever need one again. This one should last a while because I don't travel often.
customer_reviews.author: moh

customer_reviews.title: Its a perfect roll-on and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten many compliments on this suitcase. Its a perfect roll-on and very stylish! I've had no issues with zippers or wheels. It's very lightweight and easy to get around the airport and lobbies with.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and worth my money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter to transport her art tablet, tower, and keyboard safely. So far so good. She transports her supplies to her BF house every weekend. I plan on buying more for when we actually travel since she speaks so highly of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: YasmineTM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible off gassing
customer_reviews.text: Terrible off gassing.... It smells like mothballs! I have sprayed it with febreez, wipes it inside and out and have let it sit outside all day... It still smells... I hope it will air out before my trip or I will send it back a& use my old one
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep it upright. The bag kept falling over when pushed on all 4 wheels
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I first received this luggage. I purchased it 7 months ago. On my second trip with it, the expandable zipper tore from the case (zipper did not break - the zipper lining actually tore from the suitcase). And on my 4th flight with it, the top handle ripped off as my bag was being put on the scale. My bag only weighed 40 pounds, well below the 50 pound limit. I was really disappointed in the quality and I do not plan to purchase from American Tourister again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Omg this thing STINKS don’t buy this unless you have a week or two before your trip to air it out. I have to come up with a plan B for our trip this weekend as no way I can pack in this stinky thing
customer_reviews.author: Alotafun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on size and light weight. Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a carry on. The zipper and wheels are strong enough, the case is expandable for additional capacity, has a compartment with mesh and zipper to hold personal items or shoes,and a strap to keep clothes intact. It is easy to carry, light weight and great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Shree Sampath

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY IN ROSE GOLD.
customer_reviews.text: THE AIRPORT LUGGAGE HANDLERS DAMAGED THE OUTSIDE SURFACE ON MY FIRST FLIGHT. THE BEAUTIFUL OUTSIDE SKIN WAS PULLED OFF SOMDE HOW. IT HELD UP MUCH BETTER THE SECOND FLIGHT. I CHOSE THE ROSE GOL COLOR AS IT IS EASY TO PICK OUT ON THE TURN TABLES. I STILL WILL USE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Sue from Oro Valley

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: First time buying luggage and not having used luggage for all of my trips. So durable and easy to maneuver at the airports. I filled it full. Sturdy as my daughter's luggage was damaged bad on our last trip. Mine was still as pretty as when I came to the Airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy, move great
customer_reviews.text: If you like punk or rose gold this set is an absolute must! Very easy toae, even on grass. The handles don't rock or feel rickety like other branda. With the expandable zipper you can overstuff. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Altered Librarian

customer_reviews.title: I trust this company over the years.
customer_reviews.text: I trust the brand of suitcase. I purchased the 2 piece. Only disappointment was that in the picture the color looks rather a turquoise colored marble suitcase which it isn't at all. Its black & white marble instead. Picture color was deceiving but I am keeping my purchase as I know its durable.
customer_reviews.author: karyn k

customer_reviews.title: Measurements??
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but, the dimensions listed are way off. This measures like a medium size bag not large. It is way smaller than the current one that I own. I measured that one to compare. I will be returning this item😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: American Tourister Moonlight Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Rose Gold, Carry-On 21-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Carry-On 21-Inch| Color:Rose GoldBook opening case with mesh divider and cross straps in main compartment with a zipped modesty pocket. Single spinner wheels for a smooth ride. All cases expand 1.5".
feature_bullets: 21 inches Spinner luggage maximizes your packing power and meets most carry on size restrictions for those traveling domestically and looking to stay light
Packing dimensions: 20" x 14" x 9", Overall dimensions: 22” x 15”x 9.5”, Weight: 8.2 pounds

10 Year limited warranty: American Tourister products are rigorously tested to ensure our products meet stringent standards; This bag comes with a 10 year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship
Book opening case with mesh divider and Cross straps in main compartment with a zipped modesty pocket
Four, multi directional oversized spinner wheels for effortless mobility, re engineered lightweight;Volume : 44 Litres
1.5" Expansion to allow you to pack more items and compression keeps clothing neatly pressed
Push button locking handles provides easy maneuverability when extended out from the suitcase, and stores neatly inside when not in use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,132 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
